about.title: Who We Are
about.subtitle: House of Digital Business helps companies navigate the digital landscape with multilingual expertise and innovative solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To eliminate digital barriers and connect businesses globally through technology and language expertise.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Providing innovative digital solutions tailored to each client's unique needs and cultural context.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Innovation, integrity, cultural understanding, and excellence in everything we do.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your global business needs across five languages.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Website Development
multilingual.description: Custom websites optimized for international audiences with full i18n support across 5 languages.

strategy.title: Digital Strategy Consulting
strategy.description: Strategic guidance for expanding your digital presence internationally with cultural sensitivity.

localization.title: Content Localization
localization.description: Professional translation and cultural adaptation of your digital content for global markets.

seo.title: SEO & Digital Marketing
seo.description: Multilingual SEO and marketing strategies tailored to reach international audiences effectively.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: International e-commerce platforms with multi-currency, multi-language and localized payment options.

app.title: App Localization
app.description: Complete localization services for mobile and web applications in multiple languages and markets.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Success stories from businesses across the globe.

client1.name: Maria Rodriguez
client1.content: "House of Digital Business transformed our online presence with their multilingual website. Our international sales increased by 45% in just six months."

client2.name: Thomas Müller
client2.content: "The localization of our app into five languages was seamless. Their team understood cultural nuances, not just translation. Highly recommended!"

client3.name: Sophie Leclerc
client3.content: "Their digital strategy consulting helped us expand into new European markets with confidence. The multilingual SEO approach delivered impressive results."
